Title: Annular core photonic lantern OAM mode multiplexer
Source: Opt. Fiber Commun. Conf. Exhib., OFC - Proc.
Abstract: © 2017 Optical Society of America.We demonstrate an all-fiber, ring core photonic lantern to generate high quality OAM modes up to the second order at 1550nm. We achieved low-loss coupling of the lantern OAM modes into a ring core fiber.
SubjectAreas: Atomic and Molecular Physics, and Optics
